resources.string: Click Filter button to set objects types that are displayed
Open list containing all objects. Click on any object to see its details
Drag and scale map with fingers. Click on objects markers to see detailed info.
Click Jump button to center map on the selected object

Karelia is rich with lakes and rivers. Fishing in Karelia - spent a wonderful time relaxing holiday and the opportunity to enjoy a pleasant fresh forest air.
Our app includes an interactive map of Karelia which helps fishing enthusiasts choose a suitable place for fishing or recreation.
For many lakes information about the kinds of fish during the spawning season and their habitats is provided. Also map displayes fishing shops in Petrozavodsk, Kondopoga, Kostomuksha, Segezha.
This application is a part of grant KA332 of Karelia ENPI CBC programme, which is co-funded by the European Union, the Russian Federation and the Republic of Finland.
